heading: [Ben Jacobs] Oleksandr Zinchenko to #AFC is very close. Verbal agreement in place. Zinchenko excited to link up again with Mikel Arteta & personal terms expected to be agreed fast. Zinchenko, like Gabriel Jesus, sold on a more integral role. Arteta sees him as a good fit due to versatility.
